subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: D. J. Augustin scored 20 points, and Taj Gibson had 19 points and 13 rebounds to lead the Chicago Bulls to a 102-94 win in Philadelphia and hand the 76ers their 22nd straight loss.
snippet: D. J. Augustin scored 20 points, and Taj Gibson had 19 points and 13 rebounds to lead the Chicago Bulls to a 102-94 win in Philadelphia and hand the 76ers their 22nd straight loss.
